devdoc.details: Manages tokenized energy projects with tiered interest rates and scheduled paybacks Interest Rates (APY): - < 2000 USDT: 5% per year - 2000 - 20000 USDT: 7% per year - > 20000 USDT: 9% per year Payback Schedule: - Weekly interest payments after project completion - Principal payback: 20% per year starting 2 years after target reached

addAdmin(address).details: Add an admin who can create and edit projects

calculateAvailableInterest(uint256,addre.details: Calculate available weekly interest for an investor

calculateAvailablePrincipal(uint256,addr.details: Calculate available principal payback for an investor

claimPrincipal(uint256).details: Claim principal payback (20% per year starting 2 years after funding)

completeConstruction(uint256).details: Mark project construction as completed (only project owner)

depositPayoutFunds(uint256).details: Deposit funds to contract for payouts (project owner)

getEnergyRecords(uint256).details: Get energy records for a project

getFinancialSummary(uint256).details: Get off-ramp/on-ramp summary for a project

getInterestRate(uint256).details: Calculate interest rate based on investment amount (in basis points)

getInvestment(uint256,address).details: Get investment details for an investor

getOffRampTransactions(uint256).details: Get all off-ramp transactions for a project

getOnRampTransactions(uint256).details: Get all on-ramp transactions for a project

getProjectInvestors(uint256).details: Get all investors for a project

initiateOffRamp(uint256,uint256,uint256,.details: Initiate off-ramp transaction (USDT → Fiat for construction)

params._bankAccount: Last 4 digits of destination bank account
params._fiatAmount: Expected fiat amount in USD cents (e.g., 100000 = $1,000.00)
params._purpose: Description of what funds will be used for
params._usdtAmount: Amount of USDT to withdraw (6 decimals)

initiateOnRamp(uint256,uint256,uint256,s.details: Initiate on-ramp transaction (Fiat → USDT from energy revenue)

params._fiatAmount: Amount of fiat being converted (in USD cents)

investInProject(uint256,uint256).details: Invest in a project with USDT

isAdmin(address).details: Check if an address is an admin

isProjectFundingFailed(uint256).details: Check if project funding has failed (deadline passed without reaching target)

markFundingFailed(uint256).details: Mark project funding as failed if deadline passed without reaching target Can be called by anyone after deadline

owner().details: Returns the address of the current owner.

recordEnergyProduction(uint256,uint256,u.details: Record energy produced with cost (only project owner can call)

renounceOwnership().details: Leaves the contract without owner. It will not be possible to call `onlyOwner` functions. Can only be called by the current owner. NOTE: Renouncing ownership will leave the contract without an owner, thereby disabling any functionality that is only available to the owner.

toggleProjectStatus(uint256).details: Toggle project active status (only project owner)

transferOwnership(address).details: Transfers ownership of the contract to a new account (`newOwner`). Can only be called by the current owner.

devdoc.title: SandBlock
